info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 26 at 3:09PM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN HARRISON... NORTHWESTERN JEFFERSON AND SOUTHEASTERN CARROLL COUNTIES THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 309 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles north of Cadiz, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Cadiz, Wintersville, Hopedale, Scio, Jewett, Bergholz, Amsterdam, Richmond, Bowerston, Bloomingdale, Unionport, and Brentwood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
